game.board.corners

Class Corner

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.corners.Corner

  • public class Corner
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the corner of a Hex
    Author:
    Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann, Christoph Hermann, Yize Sun
    See Also:
    Hex

        yPosCartesianHex - y position of hex in cartesian coordinates
        xPosAxialCorner - x position of hex in axial coordinates
        yPosAxialCorner - y position of hex in axial coordinates
